nodes.name: Loading Screens Diversified
nodes.summary: Replaces all vanilla splash art for the loading screens with new, 16:9 widescreen files (newly made for this mod). Gives the same treatment to the unused Bethesda splash art. Adds

nodes.name: The Popular Plague
nodes.summary: A disease of an unusual nature has come to Pelagiad. Will you come to the aid of the townsfolk or let them dance until they drop?

nodes.name: Red Wisdom - An Ashlander Prophecy
nodes.summary: Embark on a mystical journey as you unravel the ancient prophecy of Red Wisdom. Join forces with wide-eyed Nirani to unlock the hidden truths that lie within the sacred burial

nodes.name: Imperial Employment Office (MD Edit)
nodes.summary: Adds a new faction to the game which is focused on non-combat oddjobs and errands for the player.

nodes.name: Greymarch Dawn - Whispers of Jyggalag
nodes.summary: Plunge into an engaging prequel to the events of the TES4:Shivering Isles expansion as the world shivers with Whispers of Jyggalag. The familiar sights of sewers and Thieves Guild

nodes.name: Leeches Always Bite Twice
nodes.summary: The swamps of Vvardenfell are more dangerous than ever with leeches as large as a mer's forearm latching onto unwary adventurers (and NPCs) who stray into the murky waters of the

nodes.name: Dynamic Class Images
nodes.summary: This mod makes it so that the class images you see during character creation and when leveling up are specific to your class. No more recycling the vanilla image for custom

nodes.name: The Mananaut's Message
nodes.summary: This mod adds Royal Imperial Mananaut Alberius outside of the Tower of Tel Fyr. He has a message that he wants you to deliver for him. At the end of the quest, you'll get your very

nodes.name: Grahtwood Roost
nodes.summary: Obtain and improve a cozy treehouse of your own through a short series of quests.

nodes.name: Lustrous Pearls
nodes.summary: Replaces pearls with HD models and textures. Includes OAAB_Data pearls and new pearl varieties. Optional add-on adds new pearl-themed items to the game.

nodes.name: Temple Master
nodes.summary: This mod lets the player take control of the Suran Temple once they advance enough in the Tribunal Temple faction. Through a series of quests (and with some choices to make along

nodes.name: Newer Gnaar Mok
nodes.summary: Newer Gnaar Mok expands the city of Gnaar Mok by adding in clutter, more NPCs, more buildings, a new miscellaneous quest, and most importantly: more verticality.

nodes.name: Arachnophobia Patch
nodes.summary: Removes spiders and spiderwebs from the game (includes OAAB_Data and Tamriel_Data)

nodes.name: The Search for the White Wave
nodes.summary: A scientific expedition headed into the Sea of Ghosts has failed to report on their progress. An investigator from the Imperial Navy has been dispatched to locate the White Wave

nodes.name: Secrets of the Crystal City
nodes.summary: The lost "Crystal City" of Massama has been discovered by a desperate group of escaped slaves. Through a series of quests, players will learn some of the secrets behind The Curse

nodes.name: Where Merchants Flea
nodes.summary: An orc you might recognize in Suran has had a stroke of bad luck. Bula gra-Muk purchased a pillow from some traveling khajiit. But the pillow came with more than just a fancy cover

nodes.name: Aspect of Azura
nodes.summary: Adds a Daedric helm bearing the aspect of Azura which you can acquire through a new quest which starts at the Holamayan Monastery near the Shrine of Azura. Explore the hidden

nodes.name: Melchior's Excellent Grazelands Acacia
nodes.summary: This mod is a pluginless replacer for the Grazelands trees which was inspired by the umbrella thorn acacia species.

nodes.name: OAAB Pomegranates
nodes.summary: Inspired by their mention of growing in the badlands of Morrowind in Sermon 12, a regional variety of pomegranates can now be found growing atop Mount Assarnibibi.

nodes.name: Dragon Statue Revisited
nodes.summary: This is a mesh and texture replacer for the Imperial dragon statue in Ebonheart. This mod is dedicated to DarkElfGuy who featured my terrible old statue replacer in his videos long

nodes.name: Glowbugs
nodes.summary: Adds firefly-like insects called glowbugs across the Bitter Coast region which come out on calm nights. They can be caught by the agile adventurer and their thorax makes a quality

nodes.name: OAAB Saplings
nodes.summary: This mod places saplings from OAAB_Data in most regions on Vvardenfell.

nodes.name: OAAB Dwemer Pavements
nodes.summary: Many of the dwemer ruins use unfitting cobblestone textures in their exteriors. This mod replaces the cobblestone textures outside of all Vvardenfell-based dwemer ruins with a new

nodes.name: Dwemer Lightning Rods
nodes.summary: With this mod, if you visit a dwemer ruin during a thunderstorm, you'll be greeted by blinding flashes as lightning strikes the steamstack lightning rods from the vanilla game. But

nodes.name: Graht Morrowind Swamp Trees
nodes.summary: Adds enormous trees to the Bitter Coast region to provide a dense canopy overheard and large roots jutting out of the ground below.

nodes.name: Adjustable Landscape Texture Scale
nodes.summary: This mod allows you to manually increase the scale of the landscape texture to make it look more detailed without the need for hi-res replacers.

nodes.name: Sload Floater - Giant Bull Netch Replacer
nodes.summary: Replaces the Giant Bull Netch with a sload "gasbag" floater creature from the Morrowind concept art. Includes minor edits to the Sheogorath quest.

nodes.name: The Cottage
nodes.summary: This mod adds a cozy little cottage on the outskirts of Gnisis.

nodes.name: I Lava Good Mesh Replacer
nodes.summary: This mod replaces all the lava meshes in the vanilla game. Removes alpha blending from lava meshes to eliminate flickering with effects like steam. Synchronizes tiled lava effects

nodes.name: Tall Vos
nodes.summary: Here is a new and improved replacement for OAAB Grazelands. Some users felt that the height of Tel Vos was unbefitting a Telvanni Lord of Aryon's stature. So I have taken that

nodes.name: OAAB Grazelands
nodes.summary: This mod is an overhaul of Vos and Tel Vos, the land surrounding them, the two nearby egg mines, covering a large portion of the northern Grazelands. Currently, the mod does not

nodes.name: OAAB Integrations
nodes.summary: This page will be used to upload minor mods which integrate content from OAAB_Data into the game by the OAAB team.

nodes.name: OAAB_Data
nodes.summary: OAAB_Data is a free-to-use asset repository for the Morrowind Community.

nodes.name: Girith's Guar Hides
nodes.summary: This mod overhauls the vanilla quest "Girith's Guar Hides" in a variety of ways. Look over the features for a list of details.

nodes.name: Unto Dust
nodes.summary: This mod adds floating dust to areas where dead are entombed similar to what is seen in Skyrim barrows. Inspired by an unused texture, these particles will appear in multiple

nodes.name: Mistify
nodes.summary: This mod enhances the ambiance of the Bitter Coast by adding a new mist effect throughout region which appears during the night and certain weather conditions. It will burn off in

nodes.name: Keg Drip
nodes.summary: This mod uses a previously unused keg droplet texture from the game files to add a new effect to select kegstands in the game. Now you might notice a leaky tap upon closer

nodes.name: Parasol Particles
nodes.summary: Adds falling spores particle effects to the iconic emperor parasol mushrooms.

nodes.name: The Madstone
nodes.summary: Makes the Madstone of the Ahemmusa align with its in game description so that the enchantment also affects the player and you will now hear the whispers of the ancestors when you

nodes.name: Thickle-Lo - The Succulent Hackle-Lo Mod
nodes.summary: Hackle-lo leaves are described as "a tasty edible succulent leaf of the Grazelands..." And yet the leaves appear to be flat and not reminiscent of a succulent. This mod edits the

nodes.name: The Dream is the Door
nodes.summary: "...the door is only seen at dawn and dusk, and the star is the 'key' that opens it." - Nibani MaesaTo align with what the in game dialogue suggests, the entrance to the Cavern of

nodes.name: Azurah
nodes.summary: What would be a greater insult to the haughty Dunmer xenophobes than the true Nerevarine being a farm tool? How about the Lady of Dawn and Dusk manifesting as Azurah, the furry

nodes.name: Infinity Wraithguard
nodes.summary: Replaces Wraithguard with the Infinity Gauntlet and adds a new backdoor way of completing the main quest which elaborates on Wraithguard's new look. Once you banish the heart,

nodes.name: Haunted Barrows
nodes.summary: In the vanilla game, Nordic barrows on Solstheim use the same "haunted whispers" sound effect that Dunmer tombs use. This mod gives the barrows their own unique sound. You will

nodes.name: Sword of the Kagouti King - A Quest for Tamriel Rebuilt
nodes.summary: Help reforge the long lost sword of the legendary Kagouti King. This figure of myth wielded an extraordinary blade moulded in the likeness of his namesake. And you will be the next

nodes.name: Unique Snowy Crown
nodes.summary: Gives the dwemer mace: Snowy Crown a unique model with different appearances for its sheathed and drawn state if you use Weapon Sheathing.

nodes.name: Dura gra-Bol's House Reclaimed - And the Grab-All Gang
nodes.summary: This mod started as a simple house mod and expanded into an entire smuggling faction - while still allowing you to choose the high road and be rewarded for killing Dura as

nodes.name: ABCs for Outlanders
nodes.summary: Adds a new book "The Ayembedt for Outlanders" to the game. This book contains artwork for each letter in the daedric "ayembedt" as I have called it.

nodes.name: Light Decay
nodes.summary: The radius of a handheld light will gradually diminish and eventually go out when the light extinguishes.

nodes.name: Gizmo the Guar Fabricant Companion
nodes.summary: Adds a Fabricant Guar companion named Gizmo. Gizmo comes with many new features including petting him, giving him treats and folding into an anuic entanglement matrix.

nodes.name: The Sanguine Rose
nodes.summary: The Sanguine Rose adds a fully featured Daedric Quest for Sanguine, the prince of hedonistic revelry, debauchery, and passionate indulgences of darker natures. An Ordinator has

nodes.name: OAAB Tel Mora
nodes.summary: OAAB Tel Mora enhances the city of Tel Mora by adding new buildings, new quests, detailing the landscape, and more. It accomplishes all this while staying lore friendly and without

nodes.name: Project Atlas
nodes.summary: The goal of Project Atlas is to identify the most performance heavy areas of vanilla Morrowind and some popular mods and target high usage/strain meshes in those areas for

nodes.name: Mamaea Awakened
nodes.summary: In vanilla Morrowind, Mamaea is a dull maze of caves with nothing remarkable about them aside from the spine of bone down the center of the cavern network. This mod aims to make

nodes.name: Glow in the Dahrk
nodes.summary: This is a modern, pluginless replacement of the old Windows Glow mods with many more features besides! Windows Glow suffered from every mod needing a patch to work with it. Glow in

nodes.name: Scrolls of The Nine Barriers
nodes.summary: This is the mod you didn't know you needed which overhauls the Scrolls of The Nine Barriers in Morrowind (e.g. Scroll of The First Barrier, Scroll of The Second Barrier, etc). This

nodes.name: Mage Robes
nodes.summary: The concept behind the mod is to provide both an immersive experience by adding a uniform to mages guild members as well as to improve gameplay by providing a useful alternative to

nodes.name: Melchior's Magnificent Manuscripts
nodes.summary: Model replacer for all of the vanilla books.

nodes.name: Better Dwarven Spectres - Mer and Maidens Edition
nodes.summary: In collaboration with OAAB Leveled Creatures, this mod will add female dwarven spectres to your game and replace the dwarven spectres with BB-style meshes. It also adds dwarven

nodes.name: Better Waterfalls
nodes.summary: New effects and textures for TES3 Morrowind waterfalls.

nodes.name: War Kagouti Companion - Mausi
nodes.summary: Travel to the Erabenimsun Camp in the Molag Amur region and talk to a warrior in chitin armor named Tinti. He is interested in selling a well trained war kagouti to a worthy

nodes.name: Dahrk's Super-Sized Storage (D'sSSS)
nodes.summary: This simple mod increases the capacity of all containers (BM and TR included) by x100. Zero capacity containers are unaltered (0*100=0). For instance, crates in the original game

nodes.name: N'wah
nodes.summary: Every non-dunmer's name has been replaced with N'wah.

nodes.name: Salt Gems of Bensamsi
nodes.summary: His methods are atypical, but an Argonian in the Sixth House base of Bensamsi has discovered a way to create soul gems from ash salts. Talk to Heem-La in the Ald-ruhn Guild of

nodes.name: Red Vos
nodes.summary: Gives the farming village of Vos a unique, reddish texture to complement the region. This changes both the interior and exterior areas of the village.

nodes.name: Wearable Lich Robe
nodes.summary: Adds a Better Bodies compatible lich robe with male and female versions which is based on the lich creature's outfit from Tribunal.

nodes.name: Vanilla-friendly West Gash Tree Replacer
nodes.summary: A West Gash tree replacer for players who desire a look closer to the vanilla game for the region.

nodes.name: White Suran 2 - MD Edition
nodes.summary: Some tweaks and improvements to the original White Suran 2 mod which gives Suran a unique, pearly white texture to distinguish it from other Hlaalu settlements.

nodes.name: Undead Glass Berserker Mod and Resource
nodes.summary: Adds a new undead creature to the leveled lists. Also includes an optional feature to punish glass thieves in Ghostgate.

nodes.name: Dagoth Almalexia Outfit
nodes.summary: Adds a new outfit to the game: the Dagoth Almalexia Outfit. This mod was a prize for one of the Honorable Mention prize winner in my Follower Appreciation Event through my Tumblr

nodes.name: OAAB Armor Preview
nodes.summary: OAAB Armor Preview is no longer supported. OAAB_Data has moved.

nodes.name: Waffle Warfare
nodes.summary: Eat waffles!Throw waffles!Shoot waffles!Wear waffles!

nodes.name: Corgi Companion
nodes.summary: Follower Appreciation Event - Grand Prize

nodes.name: Tales and Tallows in Ebonheart (Halloween Mod)
nodes.summary: Here's a (hopefully) fun little mod for you to enjoy. Head over to Ebonheart and look for Master Pepon. He's dressed in his costume at the docks just outside of the East Empire

nodes.name: Lyithdonea - The Azurian Isles
nodes.summary: Lyithdonea: The Azurian Isles is a landmass mod for Morrowind featuring a tropical paradise between Tamriel and Akavir. The mod has a strong influence from the Daedric Lord Azura

nodes.name: Sheoth Weapons
nodes.summary: This mod adds jojjo's Morrigan weapon and shield set to Morrowind. They have been cast in a Shivering Isles theme. You must find the Mad God's shrine to get the weapons and shield.

nodes.name: Dahrk Mods by Melchior
nodes.summary: An assortment of small mods, tweaks, fixes, and resources.

nodes.name: Tower of Vos
nodes.summary: This mod makes the Tower of Vos (Tel Vos) much, much taller than before. Now it dominates the Grazelands, overlooking the region.

nodes.name: Spriggans Glow
nodes.summary: This mod adds a glowbug swarm around Spriggans to make them look more fae-like and magical. It optionally includes a replacer I made for the spriggans themselves, patches for other

nodes.name: Umbra- Blademaster
nodes.summary: Overhauls everyone's favorite, death-seeking Orsimer into a truly challenging opponent with scripted behavior and new equipment.
